data.actual_result: - The highlight is cut off a little in the bottom line.
data.expected_result: The bottom highlight of the invite in the lower line should be equal to the bottom highlight of the invite in the lower line.
data.short_description: Instant invite links' highlight is cut off a little from the bottom when it is taken to the next line.
data.steps_to_repro: - Write something in the text box (don't fill the line). - Copy an instant invite. - Paste it in the text box. - Send the message ( make sure a part of the invite in on the top line and the other is in the bottom line). - Observe carefully.
